note.p: Daughter of William Smith (1756–1835) (ODNB). Aunt of Elinor Mary Bonham-Carter. Lived with her sister, Joanna Maria Bonham-Carter, at Keston House, two miles north-west of Down, Kent, from 1862.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/856/34/25)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 3 October 2018)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1862.
